price: Dan orang-orang yang berusaha (menentang) ayat-ayat Kami dengan anggapan untuk dapat melemahkan (menggagalkan azab Kami), mereka itu dimasukkan ke dalam azab.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yasʿawna fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
